name: Upwelling pelagic - Nutrient rich surface water, upwelling, eddies - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool
description:
Map of upwelling region calculated using a derivative of the IBI Coastal Upwelling Index, as measured by the presence of intensity of longitudinal temperature minima.
 Known limitations: Upwelling index depends on longitudinal sea surface temperature anomalies.
